item.title: The Databricks Tool You Didn't Know You Needed
item.author: mattnorberg4@gmail.com (Matthew Norberg)
item.description: Explains how to clearly distinguish Databricks environments by adding environment-specific labels to browser tabs with a Tampermonkey userscript. Outlines the risk of identical tab titles, provides the script with domain placeholders, and gives step-by-step setup and troubleshooting guidance for dev/QA/prod.
